# numberOfItems(inSection:)

**Instance Method**

Fetches the count of items in the specified section.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func numberOfItems(inSection section: Int) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **section**: The index of the section for which you want a count of the items.

## Return Value

The number of items in the specified section.

## Getting the state of the collection view

- **numberOfSections**: The number of sections displayed by the collection view.
- **visibleCells**: An array of visible cells currently displayed by the collection view.
